docs.snippet: LAKE WORTH, Fla., Feb. 21 (AP) -- Fay Crocker of Montevideo, Uruguay, today rallied from six strokes off the pace to win the $7,500 Lake Worth women's open. Miss Crocker shot a 1-under-par 69 for a 72-hole score of 285.

byline.original: By FELIX BELAIR Jr.Special to The New York Times

docs.snippet: President Eisenhower began his trip to Latin America yesterday where it is going to end -- in Puerto Rico. There, as they say wherever Spanish is spoken, he is en su casa -- in his own home. His problem, as he recognized in his predeparture...
docs.lead_paragraph: President Eisenhower began his trip to Latin America yesterday where it is going to end -- in Puerto Rico. There, as they say wherever Spanish is spoken, he is en su casa -- in his own home. His problem, as he recognized in his predeparture television address on Sunday evening, is to make everyone realize that the phrase is not literal.
